body_html:
@FrederickGeek8 I must admit I have too little understanding of C to really know what I am doing in those changes. I simply cobbled them together by searching for the errors I got trying to compile Tensorflow.

I installed gcc because libgomp was missing without it. See #14898 for one of the typical errors you get without these changes.
body_text:
@FrederickGeek8 I must admit I have too little understanding of C to really know what I am doing in those changes. I simply cobbled them together by searching for the errors I got trying to compile Tensorflow.
I installed gcc because libgomp was missing without it. See #14898 for one of the typical errors you get without these changes.
body:
@FrederickGeek8 I must admit I have too little understanding of C to really know what I am doing in those changes. I simply cobbled them together by searching for the errors I got trying to compile Tensorflow.

I installed ```gcc``` because ```libgomp``` was missing without it. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/14898 for one of the typical errors you get without these changes.
